main event: A peculiar flashing, tumbling object was observed by pilots of two aircraft over the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The object appeared out of a mushroom-shaped cloud, trailing a rainbow-shaped cloud of smoke.
The object was observed to be arcing from north-northeast to south-southwest.
The object climbed to approximately 50 degrees above the horizon at its highest point.
The object's speed was comparable to that of an ECHO satellite.
The pilot reported seeing a white, dome-shaped cloud on the horizon, which rose rapidly and broke apart, revealing the flashing, tumbling object.
